definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Gastrointestinal disorders big investigation, the health to take home.
sentences.chinese: 胃腸道疾病大排查，把健康帶回家。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis and treatment of gastrointestinal carcinoid.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討胃腸道類癌的診斷和治療。

sentences.english: Conclusion "Zhishi Xiaopi Decoction" is effective to improve the gastrointestinal dysfunction in severe patients.
sentences.chinese: 結論枳實消痞方能改善危重病患者胃腸道障礙。

sentences.english: Conclusions IPHC has no adverse effect on the healing of gastrointestinal anastomosis.
sentences.chinese: 結論IPHC對胃腸道吻合口癒合沒有不良影響。

sentences.english: Only drink cold to stimulate the gastrointestinal tract, make the hypothalamus produces hunger.
sentences.chinese: 只能喝涼開水去刺激胃腸道，使得下丘腦產生飢餓感。

sentences.english: Results The locating accurate rate was 94.4%.
sentences.chinese: 結果超聲對胃腸道梗阻的定位準確率94。

sentences.english: It is a nonspecific term for various pathologic states of the gastrointestinal tract.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個長期的非特異性各種病理狀態的胃腸道。

sentences.english: GIST has been suggested that it origin of pluripotential stem cells.
sentences.chinese: 它可能起源於胃腸道的多潛能間充質幹細胞。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the application of OMOM capsule endoscopies in the diagnosis of digestive tract diseases.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價膠囊內鏡對胃腸道疾病的診斷價值。

sentences.english: Because water is the most easy to be absorbed the gastrointestinal tract.
sentences.chinese: 因爲水是最容易被胃腸道吸收的。

sentences.english: Gastrointestinal tract and gastroscope inspection fee for the main diagnostic methods.
sentences.chinese: 胃腸道造影和胃鏡檢查爲主要的診斷方法。

sentences.english: Give fluid orally or parenterally as necessary to prevent dehydration.
sentences.chinese: 必要時，經口或經胃腸道外補給液體，以防止脫水。
胃腸道症狀包括胃腸氣脹。

sentences.english: It helps their gastrointestinal tracts develop and mature.
sentences.chinese: 它有助於嬰兒的胃腸道發育併成熟。

sentences.english: Multiplicity is a common feature in GI tract neurofibromas and GISTs.
sentences.chinese: 胃腸道神經纖維瘤及GISTs的常見特點是多發。

sentences.english: Objective To reappraise the origin of gastrointestinal smooth muscle tumors.
sentences.chinese: 目的重新評價胃腸道平滑肌腫瘤的組織發生。

definition: to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
